items.prompt: The business where you make a purchase is the:
items.explanation: A merchant is the seller or store in a transaction.

items.prompt: What is 'Cashback'?
options: Getting a percentage of your spending back
items.explanation: Cashback is a reward program where you receive money back on purchases.

items.prompt: Yesterday, I ________ (buy) some Bitcoin on a neobank app.
Recurring payments for services like Netflix are:
He ________ (spend) $50 on groceries last night.
If a transaction is 'Pending', it means:
options: It is authorized but not yet finalized
items.explanation: Pending transactions are waiting for the final settlement.

items.prompt: What does AI 'Categorization' do?
options: Groups spending into types (Rent, Food, etc.)
items.explanation: Categorization helps users understand where their money goes.

items.prompt: The bank ________ (give) me a bonus for opening the account.
Which verb is irregular in the past simple?
items.explanation: The past of 'pay' is 'paid', which is irregular.

items.prompt: I ________ (pay) my electricity bill this morning.
Custom labels like #Holiday are called:
items.explanation: Tagging helps filter specific types of spending.

items.prompt: The app ________ (send) a notification when the payment was cleared.
What are 'Insights' in a banking app?
items.explanation: Insights provide data-driven feedback on finances.

items.prompt: Which merchant would typically fall under the 'Transport' category?
items.explanation: Uber is a ride-sharing service, categorized as transport.

items.prompt: She ________ (get) her salary earlier this month.
A transaction that is 'reversed' means:
options: It was cancelled and money returned
It was sent to the wrong person
items.explanation: Reversal undoes a transaction and returns the funds.

items.prompt: They ________ (sell) their shares when the price was high.
Which of these is a 'Merchant'?
I ________ (make) a mistake with the account number.
What is a 'Settled' transaction?
options: One that is complete and confirmed
items.explanation: Settled means the funds have officially moved.

items.prompt: We ________ (go) to the ATM to withdraw some cash.
What is the past simple of 'say'?
The CEO ________ (speak) about the new fintech strategy.
If you 'spent' money, you:
options: Gave it for goods or services
items.explanation: Spending is the act of paying out money for something.

items.prompt: I ________ (take) a photo of the receipt.
Which verb is NOT irregular?
items.explanation: Scan follows the regular -ed rule: scanned.

items.prompt: The manager ________ (know) the customer was lying.
What is the past simple of 'write'?
She ________ (see) the transaction on her phone.
What is the negative of 'He sold his stock'?
The bank ________ (keep) my documents in a digital vault.
What is the question form of 'They paid the bill'?
items.explanation: Question past: Did + subject + base form (pay).

items.prompt: I ________ (forget) my PIN code yesterday.
The past simple of 'lose' is:
The crypto price ________ (fall) by 10% last week.
Which of these is an irregular verb?
We ________ (choose) the premium account plan.
What is the past simple of 'meet'?
He ________ (tell) me the transaction was safe.
What is the past simple of 'do'?
We ________ (do) our banking online last night.
The past simple of 'find' is:
I ________ (find) a mistake in the statement.
The past simple of 'become' is:
The bank ________ (become) a neobank in 2020.
The past simple of 'bring' is:
The customer ________ (bring) her ID to the meeting.
The past simple of 'leave' is:
He ________ (leave) the bank early.
The past simple of 'hear' is:
I ________ (hear) about the merger on the news.
The past simple of 'stand' is:
The customer ________ (stand) in line for 20 minutes.
What is the merchant category for 'Netflix'?
items.explanation: Streaming services like Netflix are categorized as entertainment.

items.prompt: The app ________ (build) a chart of my expenses.
Which of these is a 'subscription'?
options: A one-time payment for a burger
A bank fee for withdrawing cash
items.explanation: Subscriptions are recurring payments for services or software.

items.prompt: I ________ (understand) the terms of the agreement.
What is a 'transaction reversal'?
options: Returning the funds to the sender
A way to change the currency
items.explanation: A reversal cancels a previous transaction and returns the money.

items.prompt: The CFO ________ (write) a report on the spending.
If you receive a 'Refund', you:
options: Get money back for a return
items.explanation: Refunds are payments sent back to you, usually after returning a product.

items.prompt: Match the irregular verbs with their past simple forms.
Match the merchant category with the merchant.

items.title: Smart Statement Analysis
items.text: Last week, I **reviewed** my smart statement. I **found** three subscriptions I **forgot** to cancel. I **saw** that I **spent** $200 on 'Eating Out'. The AI **categorized** my Starbucks visits correctly. I also **noticed** a transaction from a merchant I didn't recognize. I **contacted** support and they **reversed** the payment immediately. I **felt** much better after organizing my finances.

questions.question: What did the author find in the statement?
questions.explanation: The text says 'I found three subscriptions I forgot to cancel'.

questions.question: How much did the author spend on 'Eating Out'?
questions.explanation: The text states the author spent $200 on 'Eating Out'.

questions.question: What happened to the unrecognized transaction?

items.title: Unrecognized Payment
items.transcript:
Customer: Hello, I saw a payment for $80 to 'TechStore' yesterday.
Agent: Yes, I see it. It is currently settled. Did you buy anything there?
Customer: No, I was at work all day. I didn't go to any store.
Agent: I understand. I will block the card and start a reversal.
Customer: Thank you. I also noticed a $5 fee. What is that?
Agent: That was for the international withdrawal you made last Friday.
Customer: Oh, right. I forgot about that trip.

questions.question: How much was the unrecognized payment?
questions.explanation: The customer mentions a payment for $80.

questions.question: What will the agent do about the card?
options: Give the customer a new PIN
questions.explanation: The agent says 'I will block the card'.

questions.question: What was the $5 fee for?
questions.explanation: The agent explains it was for an international withdrawal.

items.prompt: The past simple of 'give' is:
The neobank ________ (give) me a $10 bonus.
What does a 'Smart Statement' typically offer?
options: A way to hide your spending
items.explanation: Smart statements provide insights and categorization using technology.

items.prompt: They ________ (pay) for the dinner with their mobile wallet.
Which of these is a 'Transport' expense?
items.explanation: Taxis, buses, and trains are categorized under transport.

items.prompt: I ________ (read) the transaction history this morning.
items.explanation: The past simple of 'read' is spelled 'read' but pronounced /red/.

items.title: Expense Tracking
items.text: Every month, Clara **sets** a budget. Last month, she **went** over her limit. She **spent** too much on 'Shopping'. She **bought** three new dresses and a pair of shoes on Amazon. The app **sent** her an alert when she **hit** 90% of her budget. Clara **decided** to save more this month. She **met** with a financial advisor to talk about her goals.

questions.question: What did Clara do last month?
questions.explanation: The text says she 'went over her limit'.

questions.question: In which category did she spend too much?
When did the app send an alert?
options: When she hit 90% of her budget
At the end of the year
questions.explanation: The app sent an alert when she hit 90% of her budget.

items.title: Subscription Cancelation
items.transcript:
Agent: Support here, how can I assist you?
Customer: Hi, I saw a $15 charge for 'MusicStream' on my statement.
Agent: Yes, that is a recurring subscription. Did you sign up for a trial?
Customer: I did, but I thought I canceled it last month.
Agent: It seems it didn't process. I can reverse the charge and cancel it now.
Customer: That would be great. I didn't use the service at all.
Agent: Done. The funds will be back in your account in two days.

questions.question: Why did the charge happen?
options: It was a mistake by the bank
The customer forgot to cancel a trial
questions.explanation: It was a recurring subscription from a trial the customer thought they canceled.

questions.question: How long will the refund take?
questions.explanation: The agent says the funds will be back in two days.

items.prompt: The price of the stock ________ (rise) by 5% yesterday.
What is the merchant category for 'Starbucks'?
items.explanation: Coffee shops and restaurants are categorized as 'Food & Drink'.

items.title: Expense Report
items.prompt: Write a short report (30-50 words) about your spending last week. Mention two irregular verbs in the past simple (e.g., bought, spent, paid).
items.modelAnswer: Last week, I reviewed my banking app. I spent $100 on groceries and I paid my phone bill. I also bought a new book on Amazon. I realized that I need to save more money next month.
